pages.text: Caves are dangerous area. I know you don't want ot eat bat and spider. Try to make a Miner Salad before killed by spider or rocks!

First you need find some safe mushroom in the cave.No rabbit will secure you in the cave$(br)Some berry in the cave have special flavor!$(br)You need some salt, you can get them from some white stones$(br)You should also make it with your hand and love!

There are not any material merchant in caves so it is hard to get some salt. But miss yamame told me that there will be a lot of salt in some white stones. These stone will be close to purple crystal. If you find them don't forget to mine some salt!
